text: The place has undergone an upgrade and now feels clean and highly functional. It is a wonderful space for ibadah, providing a serene and well-maintained environment. Even during Friday prayers, it is not overly crowded, making it an excellent choice for worshippers seeking both peace and comfort.
Alhamdulillah found this masjid near my new place and it is clean and neat inside. I feel convenient to pray there. Barakallah.
Back to 90s nostalgic exterior facade since 1991 but with a twist of nicely revamp modern prayer hall

Inspired by Sumatran Minang architecture, this masjid with its brown structure stands out from the high-rise housing estate in Telok Blangah. The masjid offers weekend madrasah and weekday classes to a total of 600 children. Islamic knowledge classes are also held during the evening.

Good place for prayers ,
Wide hall after renovation.
